casebody.data:
CHANNEL MASTER CORPORATION, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. VIDEO TELEVISION, Inc., Defendant-Appellee. No. 75, Docket 22815. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Dec. 17, 1953. Decided Dec. 30, 1953. Armand E. Lackenbach, New York City, for plaintiff-appellant. No appearance for defendant-appel-lee.

Before CLARK, FRANK, and HINCKS, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed on the opinion of District Judge Inch, 117 F.Supp. 812.
